sandy.util.ArrayUtil

type
class
version
3.2
Static methods for cross platform use of Array's and TypedArray's. array parameters are Dynamic, so use with caution.

Static Variables

CASEINSENSITIVE : Int

DESCENDING : Int

NUMERIC : Int

RETURNINDEXEDARRAY : Int

UNIQUESORT : Int

Static Methods

indexOf(array : Dynamic, searchElement : Dynamic, ?fromIndex : Int) : Int

lastIndexOf(array : Dynamic, searchElement : Dynamic, ?fromIndex : Int) : Int

truncate(array : Dynamic) : Void

Makes an array 0 length, in the faster way possible per platform
